articles.summary: At the Third Plenary Session of the 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC) in July 2024, opening up was identified as a defining feature of Chinese modernization. China's evolution over the past decades shows that the more the country has developed, the more open it has become. In the context of rising protectionism in some countries, China faces challenges in stabilizing its foreign trade.
